scripts.install:all: npm install && cd electron && npm install && cd src/renderer && npm install && cd ../../.. && cd backend && pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:electron
scripts.test: cd backend && python -m pytest tests -v --tb=short -W ignore
scripts.test:backend: cd backend && python -m pytest tests -v --tb=short -W ignore
scripts.test:all: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
scripts.lint:backend: cd backend && python -m flake8 app main.py --max-line-length=120 --ignore=E501
